content: Vikash Sharma is a developer, trainer and open source technology evangelist. He has invested a large amount of time learning and implementing Scala code and authored video courses for Scala. He has authored a beginner’s book on Scala named Learning Scala Programming. He works as a software developer at Singapore Exchange Ltd.

title: Vikash Sharma
